roleset.name: impelled action

example.name: All arguments
example.text: [The purpose of these induction programs]-1 is to dispel such fears and *-1 enthuse adult learners toward further study and rapid progress.
example.arg: toward further study and rapid progress

roleset.note: Frame by Claire based on internet usage examples. No VNcls. Comparison with encourage.

roleset.name: cause enthusiasm

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mary-1 was enthused *-1 by John's eagerness.

example.name: with arg2
example.text: John enthused Mary with a bit of song and dance.
example.arg: with a bit of song and dance

roleset.note: Frame by Claire based on internet usage examples, membership in VN. Member of VNcls amuse-31.1, marvel-31.3-1, marvel-31.3-8.
